lead_paragraph: GERTON--Janice B.,educator and director of the Arts and Letters Foundation, died peacefully on April 13 in her New York City home at the age of 95. She will be dearly missed. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  GERTON, JANICE B.

snippet: GERTON--Janice B.,educator and director of the Arts and Letters Foundation, died peacefully on April 13 in her New York City home at the age of 95. She will be dearly missed. 1/3
